title: HoP 298 - Renaissance Men - Ramon Llull and Petrarch
itunes:title: HoP 298 - Renaissance Men - Ramon Llull and Petrarch
description: The Renaissance ideals of humanism and universal science flourish already in the medieval period, in the works of Petrarch and Ramon Llull.
